Define Documentation

#define GLAZIERY_LABEL (  variable,
area,
groupField,
text   ) 
 

Value:

Label * variable; \
   if ((variable = new Label) == NULL) \
      throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
   if (area != NULL) \
      ((FieldsArea *) area)->appendField(variable); \
   if (groupField != NULL) \
      ((GroupField *) groupField)->appendField(variable); \
   variable->setText(text);
